trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.

Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示将用来处理 <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The event model in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] is based on having an event delegate that connects an event with its handler.
trans-unit.target: 中的事件模型[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]基于具有与其处理程序连接事件的事件委托。

trans-unit.source: To raise a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event, two elements are needed:
trans-unit.target: 若要引发<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>事件，需要两个元素：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs> class, derived from <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=nameWithType>, which holds the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs>类，派生自<xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=nameWithType>，其中包含事件数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventHandler> delegate, which points to a method that provides the response to the event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventHandler>委托，它指向提供对事件作出响应的方法。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventHandler> 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 事件和委托](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。
